name: BEE A GOOD BEE: And Fetch Me Some Pollen
name_original: BEE A GOOD BEE: And Fetch Me Some Pollen
description:
This is my first ever Unity project (I typically develop with Godot).  I was initially overconfident and the game was massively simplified.   I had a ton of difficulty but have learned so much.  Made in 72 hours for LD52.

Music by Trevor Moore

Note!  Resetting after losing is bugged-- there will be more flowers each time increasing the difficulty.  Lol.  Refresh to try again.
